attributes.action: Allow families to send mail FREE to MoD staff posted overseas on active service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Charging to send mail to service men and women in active service overseas is a disgrace. 
Please sign this petition to ask Gordon Brown to allow FREE post to BFPO.

N.B. MP's get an allowance £37,000 for communications.
